#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    string word;
    cin>>word;

    long long int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        long long int a,b;
        cin>>a>>b;

        a = a%word.length();
        if(a==0)
            a=word.length();

        b = b%word.length();
        if(b==0)
            b=word.length();

        if(word[a-1]==word[b-1])
           cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
        else
           cout<<"No"<<endl;
    }
}
